info.title: Building Type Analysis
info.description: Not sure? Narrow down whether your project falls under the specifications of a single- or a multi-unit dwelling.

possibleAnswers.answerDisplayText: This project will involve construction of a new <defined-term>building</defined-term>.
This building is a single dwelling unit.

This building is a multi-dwelling unit with no other <defined-term override-term='major occupancy'>major occupancies</defined-term> (including single-family house with a <defined-term>secondary suite</defined-term>)

possibleInvalidAnswers.errorMessage: 'None of the above' cannot be selected at the same time as other answers

P02.questionText: This project will meet all of the following requirements:
P02.questionSubtext:
• The building area of this building is not greater than 600 m2
  • The storeys in building height will be less than 4.

R00.resultDisplayMessage: This tool is only designed to assist users evaluating the code compliance for construction of a new single unit or multi-unit dwelling building to the BC Building Code 2024, as such this tool is not applicable to your building.

R01.resultDisplayMessage: Based on your selection this building is a new single dwelling unit. Click Continue to view the associated walkthroughs.

R02.resultDisplayMessage: Based on your selection this building is a new multi-dwelling unit. Click Continue to build your walkthrough.

R03.resultDisplayMessage: Based on your selection this building exceeds the maximum building area and/or building height limits for a Part 9 Building. If the building is more than 600 m2 in building area and/or 3 storeys in building height, this building will be required to be designed in accordance with Parts 3, 4, 5, and 6 of the BC Building Code 2024 in place of Part 9. This tool only evaluates the Building Code compliance of buildings designed in accordance with Part 9 of the BC Building Code 2024, please contact the appropriate required design professionals for this building.
